borrow(uint256,uint256,uint256,address,u.details: Borrows ETH from reserve using an NFT as collateral and will receive a loan NFT as receipt.

params.amount: amount of ETH user will borrow
params.duration: The desired duration of the loan
params.onBehalfOf: address of the user who will receive ETH and loan NFT.*

closeMoneyMarket(uint256).details: Only callable by the emergency admin role

create(address,string,string).details: Only callable by the pool admin role

params.name: The name of the oToken
params.underlyingAsset: The address of the underlying asset

params.referralCode: integrators are assigned a referral code and can potentially receive rewards*

endLiquidation(uint256,uint256).details: Completes liquidation for a loan which will be repaid.

params.amount: The amount of the token that will be repaid.
params.loanId: The ID of the liquidated loan that will be repaid.

extend(uint256,uint256,uint256,address).details: Extends creates a new loan and terminates the old loan.

params.amount: The amount of ERC20 token the user will borrow in the new loan
params.duration: The selected duration the user will borrow in the new loan
params.onBehalfOf: The address will borrow in the new loan*

getAvailableLiquidity(uint256).details: Returns the remaining liquidity of the reserve

getBorrowLimitByOracle(uint256,address,u.details: Returns the instantaneous borrow limit value of a special NFT

getReserveData(uint256).details: Returns the state of the reserve

getReserveNormalizedIncome(uint256).details: Returns the normalized income of the reserve

getTVL(uint256).details: Returns TVL (total value locked) of the reserve.

getTotalBorrowBalance(uint256).details: Returns the sum of all users borrow balances include borrow interest accrued

returns._0: The total borrow balance of the reserve

openMoneyMarket(uint256).details: Only callable by the emergency admin role

pause().details: Pause pool for emergency case, can only be called by emergency admin.*

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

repay(uint256).details: Repays a loan, as a result the corresponding loan NFT owner will receive the collateralized NFT.

params.loanId: The ID of the loan the user will repay

setInterestModelAddress(uint256,address).details: Only callable by the pool admin role

params.interestModelAddress: The new address of the interest model contract*

setTreasuryFactor(uint256,uint256).details: Only callable by the pool admin role

params.factor: The new treasury factor of the reserve*

startLiquidation(uint256).details: Starts liquidation for a loan when it's in LIQUIDATABLE status

params.loanId: The ID of the loan which will be liquidated

unpause().details: Unpause pool for emergency case, can only be called by emergency admin.*

params.amount: amount of oETH to withdraw and receive native ETH*

setInterestModelAddress(uint256,address).notice: Updates the interest model address of a reserve

setTreasuryFactor(uint256,uint256).notice: Updates the treasury factor of a reserve

userdoc.notice: Main point of interaction with OpenSky protocol's pool - Users can:   # Deposit   # Withdraw*
